discourse_list.title: Why hesitate to add USDC-B and TUSD as New Collateral Types?

content.content: The latest executive still needs 21k MKR to pass, https://vote.makerdao.com/executive-proposal/add-usdcb-and-tusd-as-new-collateral-types Why is there hesitation to pass this executive? Is it controversial?
content.GPT-summary: The post is a question about a proposal to add USDC-B and TUSD as new collateral types. The author of the proposal is being asked to explain why there is hesitation to pass the executive and if it is controversial.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: IMO it’s because society is literally crumbling on our doorsteps and people aren’t exactly rushing to their ledger nanos :). I think it will be fine just give it a few more days.
GPT-discussion-categories: None of the topics listed match.
